authors: Chase me ladies, I'm the Cavalry

breadcrumbs-desc: Adds a trail of breadcrumbs to the page to show the path of users through the wiki.
prefs-breadcrumbs-separator-max: A maximum of two characters may be entered.
prefs-breadcrumbs-numberofcrumbs-max: A maximum of twenty breadcrumbs can be shown.
prefs-breadcrumbs-preceding-text-max: A maximum of thirty characters can be entered.
